Name Substitutions.pay element name substitutions: should be included in this dictionary
Name Substitutions.the current name does here: the replacement name goes here, for example...

Input Files: the path and filename for all input files should be listed here
input files must be in csv format using standard ANSI encoding
exclude the file extension from the filename when adding to this list
remember to separate each path with a comma
Output File: the path and filename of the output file goes here
Local Install Paths: path(s) to local user installation directory(ies) for python modules goes here
remember to separate each path with a comma
Elements File: the path and filename of the csv file (in ANSI encoding) that contains the elements table does here
